channel.title: Numbers on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Numbers on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Format number to 2 decimal places in Java
item.description: Quick example to format any type of number - int, long, float, and double to 2 decimal places in Java

item.title: How to generate Random Numbers in Java
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to generate a random number, generate a random array or list, get a random element from an array or list, and shuffle the list elements.

item.title: Convert Roman to Integer in Java
item.description: Problem: Given a Roman numeral, convert it to an Integer.

item.title: Convert Integer to Roman in Java
item.description: Problem: Given an Integer input, convert it to a Roman numeral. Input is within the range from 1 to 3999.
